metadata.title: CVE-2015-8920 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The _ar_read_header function in archive_read_support_format_ar.c inlibarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds stack read) via a crafted ar file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8920` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
